be.guile

[bIgaIl; biˋ^ail]

及物动词
1 a. 欺骗,诈欺<人>

c. 欺诈<人>而取得[…],骗取<人>[…] [out of,of]
She was ~d of her diamond.

a. 娱乐,哄<人>[with, by]
~ children with stories

I ~d my long journey by listening music.

3 <事物>迷住<人>,使…著迷
